attributes.action: Allow those already in the UK switching to care visa to bring dependants
attributes.additional_details: Care worker should allow dependent so they can live with their families
attributes.background: People who already live in uk with his families will be separated due to this change happened 11 march 2024

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709341
